price: Nuh'u akasema: Mola wangu Mlezi! Hakika hao wameniasi, na wamemfuata yule ambaye mali yake na wanawe hawakumzidishia ila khasara.
arabic: قَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمۡ عَصَوۡنِي وَٱتَّبَعُواْ مَن لَّمۡ يَزِدۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥٓ إِلَّا خَسَارٗا
footnotes: Alisema Nuh'u: Mola wangu Mlezi! Hakika watu wangu wamenikatalia mimi niliyo waamrisha ya kuamini na kutaka msamaha, na wakawafuata madhaifu miongoni mwao ambao mali yao na watoto wao hawawazidishii ila khasara tupu katika Akhera.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla nūḥun rabbi innahum ʿaṣawnī wa-ittabaʿū man lam yazid'hu māluhu wawaladuhu illā khasāran
